title: Looks good - but supposed functionality missing
comment: Update - The weather widget is working properly now but for some reason the international clock times are not automatically updated. Surely the clock times should not depend on manual refreshing but should automatically update. Developers please kindly look into this issue. Specs - Samsung Galaxy Note - Gingerbread 2.3.6, Baseband version - N7000XXLA4 Kernel - 2.6.35.7-N7000XXLA6-CL907341dpi@DELL174#2

Sorry about the late reply! Times should update automatically. I don't know about any general issues with the Galaxy Note or Gingerbread.
A task manager that kills background processes can interfere with the update. If you use one, add the app to its white list. Then remove the widgets and add them again. Please send me a mail if that doesn't work.

title: Absolutely Brilliant! Samsung Galaxy S4
comment: Fantastic world clock.  Can add many different time zones very easily. Only used for a short time. No ads either. Also includes weather for the time zone.

title: Good
comment: Pls fix able to transferred to sd card. Thanks

Thanks for letting me know about the weather issue. I did indeed find an error in the weather retrieval code. It will be fixed in version 1.5.5 to be released soon.
As for "Send to SD card" feature: widgets need to be installed in the internal storage to work correctly. That's why "Send to SD card" is not enabled.
